title: The Girl on the Train
writer: Gaurav Shukla, Ribhu Dasgupta, Abhijeet Khuman
short_cast: Parineeti Chopra, Aditi Rao Hydari, Kirti Kulhari, Avinash Tiwary, Tota Roy Chowdhury
cast: Parineeti Chopra, Aditi Rao Hydari, Kirti Kulhari, Avinash Tiwary, Tota Roy Chowdhury
genre: Mysteries, Hindi-Language Movies, Movies Based on Books, Bollywood Movies, Crime Movies, Thriller Movies

desc: A troubled divorcée fixates on a seemingly ideal couple from afar until a shocking observation sends her spiraling straight into a knotty murder case.
